newsItems.title: News24.com | Mbalula applauds security forces for speedy response in airport robbery
newsItems.description: Police Minister Fikile Mbalula has congratulated the speedy response of security forces in foiling the airport robbery that took place at OR Tambo International Airport.

newsItems.title: News24.com | ANC open to new ideas on succession plan
newsItems.description: Some leaders in the ANC are considering a change in tact when it comes to its highly contested succession debate.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Search for missing 7-year-old girl at sea continues
newsItems.description: Search operations are still underway for a 7-year-old girl who went missing after she was swept off some rocks by waves on the coastline at Betty's Bay.

newsItems.title: Sport24.co.za | Valverde breaks kneecap after TDF crash
newsItems.description: Spanish veteran Alejandro Valverde suffered a broken kneecap in a crash that knocked him out of the Tour de France, his Movistar team has said.

newsItems.title: News24.com | UK rejects request to replace local authority after fire
newsItems.description: The British government has rejected demands that the prime minister appoints commissioners to run the local government blamed for mishandling the Grenfell Tower disaster.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Climbers missing on Killer Mountain presumed dead
newsItems.description: A spokesperson for the Alpine Club of Pakistan says two mountaineers who went missing while scaling the country's "Killer Mountain" are presumed dead.

newsItems.title: News24.com | UN: Italy needs support helping migrants
newsItems.description: Italy needs more international support to cope with a wave of migrants that has flooded its shores, says UN refugee chief Filippo Grandi.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Five North Koreans defect to South Korea
newsItems.description: Five North Koreans in a small boat have crossed the sea border into South Korean waters, a Coast Guard official says, in an apparent bid to defect to the South.

newsItems.title: Sport24.co.za | Proteas draw positives from drawn tour match
newsItems.description: The Proteas received a thorough workout in the drawn three-day match against the England Lions at New Road in Worcester on Saturday.

newsItems.title: Sport24.co.za | Proteas women braced for Windies clash
newsItems.description: Proteas all-rounder, Marizanne Kapp says the time for talking is passed and itâ€™s time for the team to start practicing what they preach.

newsItems.title: Sport24.co.za | Federer won't count out Wimbledon rivals
newsItems.description: Roger Federer insists he won't have an easy road to a record eighth Wimbledon crown despite the recent struggles of his title rivals.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Ukraine: Russia was behind cyber attack
newsItems.description: Ukraine says Russian security services have been involved in the massive cyber attacks that disabled computers across the world.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Nevada launches sales of recreational marijuana
newsItems.description: Nevada has become the fifth state in the US with stores selling marijuana for recreational purposes and even more tourists are expected to flock to Las Vegas.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Scores injured in triple minibus crash
newsItems.description: More than 40 people have been injured in an accident involving three minibus taxis on the M4 highway in Durban, paramedics say.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Service delivery protest brings Hout Bay to a standstill
newsItems.description: All roads in and out of Hout Bay are still closed - except for Constantia Nek and Victoria Road via Llandudno - due to an ongoing protest by disgruntled residents in the informal settlement of Imizamo Yethu.

newsItems.title: News24.com | 23 arrested during JMPD bust of 'hijacked' buildings
newsItems.description: Undocumented foreign nationals have been arrested by the Johannesburg Metro police department in a crime prevention operation targeting "hijacked buildings".

newsItems.title: Sport24.co.za | Lions maul hapless Sunwolves
newsItems.description: The Lions have convincingly beaten the Sunwolves 94-7 in their Super Rugby match at  Emirates Airlines Park in Johannesburg on Saturday.

newsItems.title: Sport24.co.za | Valverde crashes out of Tour de France
newsItems.description: TDF contender Nairo Quintana suffered a blow as key team-mate Alejandro Valverde crashed out of the race during the opening stage in Dusseldorf.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Hold a referendum on land - Mahumapelo
newsItems.description: North West Premier Supra Mahumapelo has called for a referendum on amending the Constitution to allow for the expropriation of land without compensation.

newsItems.title: News24.com | Foreigners banned as Singapore holds gay-rights rally
newsItems.description: Thousands of Singaporeans dressed in pink have packed a city park for a gay-rights rally under tight security after the government banned foreign participants.
